dt: {bc}constituting or belonging to a cursive form of ancient Egyptian writing simpler than the {a_link|hieroglyphic}

et: Latin {it}hieraticus{/it} sacerdotal, from Greek {it}hieratikos{/it}, from {it}hierasthai{/it} to perform priestly functions, from {it}hieros{/it} sacred; probably akin to Sanskrit {it}iṣara{/it} vigorous
shortdef: constituting or belonging to a cursive form of ancient Egyptian writing simpler than the hieroglyphic
